title: Eyes Wide Shut
lyrics:
You know it's hard to be the person that's waiting
I can't keep up, so I'll wait for you
And the way you act out, I can't explain it
Haven't slept for days and I'm blaming you
And I don't mind the fighting or the secrets that you're hiding

I just can't go on denying no more

And do you know, do you know, do you know

That you're too far out to love? Too far out, girl



Look what you do to me, oh

I'm tired of eyes wide shut

This crazy love, I can't fix it

I'm not wild enough for you

Look what you do to me, oh

I tired of eyes wide shut

This crazy love, I can't fix it

Quit crazy love, I can't fix it, no



You're too far out

Too far out to love



And there were times when I thought you were changing

Even though I tried, I can't change for you, I can't change for you

So I guess this love is through

It's not steady enough for me or ready enough for you



'Cause I don't mind the fighting or the secrets that you're hiding

I just can't go on denying no more

And do you know, do you know, do you know

That you're too far out to love? Too far out, girl



Look what you do to me, oh

I'm tired of eyes wide shut

This crazy love, I can't fix it

I'm not wild enough for you

Look what you do to me, oh

I tired of eyes wide shut

This crazy love, I can't fix it

Quit crazy love, I can't fix it, no



You're too far out



You know it's hard to be the person that's waiting

I can't keep up, so I'll wait for you (oh, baby)



Look what you do to me, oh

I'm tired of eyes wide shut

This crazy love, I can't fix it

I'm not wild enough for you

Look what you do to me, oh

I tired of eyes wide shut

This crazy love, I can't fix it

Quit crazy love, I can't fix it, no



You're too far out, no more

You're too far out

Too far out to love

You're too far out

Too far out to love
